run()[source]

services.DataLoaderService module

data_base=None this does ETL as if it was loading SQL queries from a database (but it is not).

This is only offline loader, it is used to load: SteamGames SteamGamesTags SteamGamesGenres SteamGenres SteamTags SteamGamesReviews

This does NOT tokenize the descriptions - this is done in the ‘data_tokenizer’

It will then compile these into a single dataframe and CSV file.

NOTE: If the Steam_Games_Merged.csv does NOT exist, you can just run this as long as you supply the inputs. It will output the complete and cleaned/processed dataframe as a CSV file.

UPDATE IMPORTANT: This is treated as a ‘Loader’ and all transformations are being consolidated into the data_transformer file. This will produce a ‘main’ training CSV file that models use.

services.DataTransformerService module

class services.DataTransformerService.DataTransformerService(data_base: AbstractData, logger: ILoggerService)[source]

Bases: BaseService

This is a function that is used to emulate ETL from a data-mart. This is a pipeline to load the data, process it, and save it.

This data csv is used for all models.
